Articles.Content:
I have started to build a colony on the VAB. I plopped a rover onto the building but I want lots more like a bulldozer and a habitation module. So please share your ideas so I can build a great town on the VAB.

- - - Updated - - -

Also a truck
Hitchhikers stuck together as towers, or Mk3 passenger modules. A cupola for viewing and roads made out of strucutral panels
a mining drill... maybe theres ore in the vab, who knows
Thx I will use these tips tomorrow and how the kerbal should I get structural plates to the VAB.

Now that's a unique idea! All those people that colonize the mun and beyond feel so special, but the VAB roof is where the adventure is really at!

Add a building (made of structural panels/wings) to the top. Also a launchpad for the reusable SSTO rocket (fueled by the ore drills)! The colonists have to get to orbit somehow.
Kinda not my idea. Inspired by a comedy video by danny2475
How would be a runway on the VAB?
Treehouse.
Please post pictures!
Nice. Add a bungee jumps from VAB. Also a pirate ship. And a shark. I would do that.
How about on the tracking station, water towers, R&D, Contract, Astronought complex, SPH, the budget building or the air trafic control trower?

a mining drill... maybe theres ore in the vab, who knows

...now I have to try that to see if it works heh.
There is in fact Ore in the VAB.

There is in fact Ore in the VAB.

Excellent, install Extraplanetary Launchpads, mine the Ore, then build rockets on top of the VAB! Put those wrench-tapping buffoons inside the VAB out of work by stealing their job!
Anyone hav a vtol (small but can hold at least 4 kerbals.) how DO you post pics

Anyone hav a vtol (small but can hold at least 4 kerbals.) how DO you post pics

To post pictures you will have to upload the image to an image hosting website such as Imgur. I have also attempted to colonise the VAB roof and using the KAS mod built a crane on the roof.
Anyone have a bulldozer
Needs a bit of a ramp really. Could get anything up there then.

Needs a bit of a ramp really. Could get anything up there then.

Too much parts. I use detachable engines instead

To post pictures you will have to upload the image to an image hosting website such as Imgur. I have also attempted to colonise the VAB roof and using the KAS mod built a crane on the roof. http://i.imgur.com/8nu8dwz.png

Is that bolted to the VAB or is it just sitting unattached on the VAB?
Top of the flagpole?

also you would need a garbage truck cause after some of the crash landings you have lots of trash to throw away

- - - Updated - - -

Also, is there a way to get a class a asteroid up there. The colonists have to have a big boulder to mine after all the VAB ore is extracted.

322997am,

Here's one way:

Best,

-Slashy

Is that bolted to the VAB or is it just sitting unattached on the VAB?

It is bolted to the VAB but if you try to lift something too heavy it will detach.

thx slashy i will try that method

- - - Updated - - -

pics yaaay https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B2ba6grAqfXRRE5xWjhmOUpuWTA&usp=sharing
